Text:
Well, there is always some jerk that puts a -1 on a torrent that they have not even downloaded yet! This has been up for about 2 hours but they drop a -1 on it!

Anyway, to the rest of you out there I hope you enjoy this very complete Godsmack collection. Yes, it is a bit big due to the video but you don't have to download that if you don't want.

I have placed this on my server, and while it is not the fastest upload speed it is available 24/7 so should not be all that long before there are enough peers/seeds to improve the speed.

Enjoy!
Thanks for sharing. Haven't listened to them in a while, but going to see them in April, so gotta get caught up with their new stuff!
Excellent download and thank you. As for the fucking punk, smoke this, bitch!
Wonderful upload, thank you very much !
thanks man, recently had a virus that wiped my drive so needed to get my collection back +1 from me
